original_text: They will call other people to come to their mountain. They will offer the right sacrifices there. They will become rich from their work on the seas, and from things that are hidden in the sand on the shore. They will call other people to come to their mountain. korean_text: 그들이 백성들을 불러 산에 이르게 하고 거기에서 의로운 제사를 드릴 것이며 바다의 풍부한 것과 모래에 감추어진 보배를 흡수하리로다

sentences.original_text: They will offer the right sacrifices there
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 거기에서 올바른 제물을 드릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will become rich from their work on the seas
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 바다에서 하는 일로 부자가 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and from things that are hidden in the sand
